address2: 19 Gardner Williams Ave, Paardevlei, Somerset West

partnerDetails.about:
Integ System Integrators offer a wide variety of integrated industrial automation solutions throughout Southern Africa. INTEG places emphasis on innovation, quality and the generation of customer value.

INTEG’s core purpose is to provide fit-for-purpose industrial automation and control solutions as well as services that make a positive difference in the businesses of our customers.

Our vision is to be a leading diversified and differentiated automation solutions provider admired for its people, its service, delivering exceptional value and innovation that improve the way our customers work and live.
